item.description:
Pot Luck BBQ at Cyndie's place at Peter's Pond Park! RAIN or SHINE!!!

**** Please read:
People should car pool or meetup before you come into the park. Cyndie has a couple of car passes for people to get in. Cyndie will meet everyone inside the gate so that they can follow her up to the sight.

Everyone Bring a Dish: Main Course for the grill, Salad, Side, Dessert or Paper Goods.

3 Women Choose a Main Course for the Grill: Chicken, Beef, Hot Dogs, Fish, etc.

2 Women Choose Salad: Tossed, Potato, Macaroni, etc.

3 Women Choose Sides: Potatoes, Rice, Veggies.

2 Women Choose Dessert!

1 Woman to bring Paper Goods (plates, cups, napkins, plastic ware)

IMPORTANT!!!!

PLEASE PAY ATTENTION: WHEN YOU RESERVE PLEASE ADD A NOTE AS TO WHAT TYPE OF COURSE YOU ARE BRINGING AND WHAT IT IS SO IT WON'T BE REPEATED.

IF ALL THE MAIN COURSES ARE TAKEN, DO NOT PICK THIS, GO TO ANOTHER CATEGORY. THE SAME GOES FOR SALADS, SIDES AND DESSERTS.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Cyndie at the entrance!

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Pot Luck BBQ at Cyndie's place at Peter's Pond Park/Sandwich
